document.full_text: a small planed loaded with bundles of cocaine crashed into a lake in northern new mexico on sunday morning, apparently killing all on board, according to the new mexico state police.
document.title: small plane full of cocaine crashes in new mexico lake
lines_and_colors: a small planed loaded with bundles of cocaine crashed into a lake in northern new mexico on sunday morning, apparently killing all on board, according to the new mexico state police.
